mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RANKING R JOIN USER U ON R.RANK_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE R.GAME = #{gametype}

SELECT AA.* FROM ranking RNK JOIN ( SELECT R.ID , R.RANK_ID , U.NICKNAME , R.DATE , R.TIME , R.GAME , R.COMMENT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY R.TIME ASC) AS "rank" FROM RANKING R JOIN USER U ON R.RANK_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE R.GAME = 'theHostel' ORDER BY R.TIME ASC) AA ON RNK.RANK_ID = AA.RANK_ID WHERE RNK.RANK_ID = #{userId} LIMIT 1;
